name: @automattic/full-site-editing
description: Plugin and theme enabling full site editing with the block editor.
author: Automattic, Inc.

scripts.docker:install: npm run docker:compose exec wordpress bash -c "/var/scripts/install.sh"
scripts.docker:uninstall: npm run docker:compose exec wordpress bash -c "/var/scripts/uninstall.sh"
scripts.docker:clean: npm run docker:compose down --rmi all -v && rm -rf docker/wordpress/* docker/wordpress/.htaccess docker/wordpress-develop/* docker/logs/* docker/data/mysql/*
scripts.docker:sh: npm run docker:compose exec wordpress bash
scripts.docker:wp: npm run docker:compose exec wordpress wp --allow-root --path=/var/www/html/
scripts.docker:tail: npm run docker:compose exec wordpress bash -c "/var/scripts/tail.sh"
